send-funds.title: Send ETH, ERC20 tokens & NFT
send-funds.description: Send your funds with the press of a button.

info-one.title: Send Transactions
info-one.text: MEW gives you full control-send your funds to anyone, anywhere, at any time, without middlemen, minimums, or limits.

info-two.title: NFT Manager
info-two.text: View and manage all of your collectibles and domains in MEW’s NFT Manager.

info-three.title: Work with other chains
info-three.text: MEW supports additional Ethereum-compatible networks including Ethereum Classic (ETC), Binance Smart Chain (BNB) and Polygon, so that users can manage assets beyond the Ethereum mainnet.

swap.title: Swap
swap.description: MEW has partnered with 1inch, DEX AG, Changelly, Bity, and Simplex for easy crypto purchases and swaps. Buy ETH right in the wallet, swap ETH for ERC20 tokens, BTC and more!

info-one.title: Cross-Chain Swaps
info-one.text: MEW offers cross-chain swaps for a variety of popular coins. Swap between Ether and Bitcoin, Litecoin, or even DOGE!

info-two.title: Competitive Rates
info-two.text: MEW works with decentralized exchange aggregators 1inch and DEX.AG to find the best price on your token swap. This way you don’t have to deal with multiple platforms to get the best rate.

info-three.title: Cash Out to Fiat
info-three.text: Our partner Bity allows anyone to cash out their Ether for Euros or Swiss Francs.

dapps.title: DApps
dapps.description: Decentralized Applications (DApps) are what makes Ethereum special.

info-one.title: DApps Center
info-one.text: Explore our integrated DApps to fully experience Ethereum’s capabilities. Take advantage of DeFi services with our partners Aave and MakerDAO, and register a domain name for your wallet through ENS or Unstoppable Domains. We are constantly adding more DApps!

info-two.title: Submit Your Own DApp!

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: If it is on Ethereum, you can manage it with MEW.

info-one.title: Buy Tokens
info-one.text: Swap for ERC20 tokens and stablecoins through our decentralized providers.

info-two.title: Custom Tokens
info-two.text: MEW automatically supports most ERC20 tokens through our API, but if you don’t see the token you’re looking for, you can add it as a custom token right in the interface!

smart-contracts.title: Smart Contracts
smart-contracts.description: Interact with any smart contract on Ethereum, whether we’ve integrated it or not!

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: Send or verify messages from the MEW interface to verify ownership of your wallet.

buy-eth.title: Buy ETH
buy-eth.description: Purchase Ether with a credit card through our providers
